article.title: A Correct Mac OS X Version of MyJazzBand 2 Lite - OCaml

contents.p: It's quite difficult to get as much programming work done here in the summer: there're more things to see and do and places to visit. There's also gardening (photos in the gallery section). I have however been working on a few experiements with harmonic analysis which I'll write about quite soon.
In the mean time, I need to post this note with a correct Mac OS X version of MJB2Lite-OCaml:
The one I posted last month didn't work.
